unnormalised: Crop insurance, yaar, such a lifesaver! Especially with unpredictable monsoons here in Andhra. Remember last year's floods near Vijayawada? A lot of farmers lost everything. Good thing many had PMFBY. Heard Ramesh got Rs. 50,000 after his paddy fields were ruined. Still, the process can be slow. Hoping for a better payout system, like during Onam, when everyone gets their share quickly. Need it before the next biryani feast, eh? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, yaar, such a lifesaver! Especially with unpredictable monsoons here in Andhra. Remember last year's floods near Vijayawada? A lot of farmers lost everything. Good thing many had P M F B Y. Heard Ramesh got rupee fifty thousand after his paddy fields were ruined. Still, the process can be slow. Hoping for a better payout system, like during Onam, when everyone gets their share quickly. Need it before the next biryani feast, eh? Jai Kisan!
